text: "Johnny B. Goode" is a song written by Chuck Berry. The single appears on Berry's 1958 album Chuck Berry Is on Top. The song was recorded on January 6, 1958 and became the biggest hit of his career. It is played in the 1985 movie Back to the Future. title: Johnny B. Goode
